description: Homestead Gold and Silver Ltd. operates as a mobile technology integrator and global wireless content publisher. It specializes in mobile content marketing and distribution. The company operates as a reseller and deployment partner for the projection, installation, and implementation of wireless communications. It also supplies, installs, and manages an integrated wireless network infrastructure that enables the anywhere, anytime, wireless/mobile broadband access, as well as provides order management integration for distributor and dealer networks to provide instant propagation out and ordering in of catalog products and services to computers and mobile communications devices. The company was formerly known as Sunland Media Group and changed its name to Homestead Gold and Silver Ltd. in September 2011. Homestead Gold and Silver Ltd. is headquartered in Las Vegas, Nevada.
